devdoc.details: Feature that allows spending token allowances.

_spendERC20Tokens(address,address,addres.details: Transfers ERC20 tokens from `owner` to `to`. Only callable from within.

getAllowanceTarget().details: Get the address of the allowance target.

getSpendableERC20BalanceOf(address,addre.details: Gets the maximum amount of an ERC20 token `token` that can be      pulled from `owner` by the token spender.

returns.amount: The amount of tokens that can be pulled.

migrate(address).details: Initialize and register this feature. Should be delegatecalled      into during a `Migrate.migrate()`.

params.allowanceTarget: An `allowanceTarget` instance, configured to have        the ZeroeEx contract as an authority.
